#summary Macroses for plugins.

This macroses are intended for work with foreign plugins.

 * [Addon_EMenu Macroses for EMenu plugin]

 * [Addon_EditFind Macroses for EditFind plugin]

 * [Addon_EditFindEsc If remove highlight of EditFind Plugin, close editor (Esc) otherwise]

 * [Addon_VisualCompare VisualCompare tricks]

 * [Addon_SizeManager Macro is allow to walking through the directories if SizeManager plugin is open]
